title: Andrei Rudakov
text:
Andrei Borisovich Rudakov (; born 19 January 1961) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> official and coach and a former player. He works as a director of sports with <a href="FC%20Arsenal%20Tula">FC Arsenal Tula</a>.
He played in <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>, for <a href="FC%20Fribourg">FC Fribourg</a>, <a href="FC%20Bulle">FC Bulle</a> and FC Siviriez.
Post-playing career.
He remained in Switzerland after retiring as a player and served as the president of <a href="Neuch%C3%A2tel%20Xamax%20FCS">Neuchâtel Xamax</a> for a short period of time in 2011.
On 29 July 2017, he was appointed director of sports by the <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> club <a href="FC%20Arsenal%20Tula">FC Arsenal Tula</a>.
